data.text: Nà ɗa ɠɛ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ma: «Ɗa ga Màliɠii,
Taɠiligaa ta undaanɛɛi ɠaiziɛzu gala kiligiti zea,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa é ga nà-kulanumai, ta nà-undaanɛɛi,
Gè nɔ̀nɔ ma ʋoganii zɔlɔɔga, nii fizɔgai,
Nà Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI mamasu, nii é tɛ̀nɛsu.
Gàazu logɛ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋa yeenɔpɛ, mazɔlɔɔ toɠa kòbaʋɛ,
Naa ɠa é ba, zìi ɠaanɛa, zɛ̀nvui ɗa ɠoozunɛ,
Mazɔlɔɔ è la ɠɛlɛa bà, gè ʋa yɛ gɔvɛalaazu,
Ɗa zɛnvu ʋelei lɛ ga ze,
